title: How to think Meghan Markle will react to Jessica Mulroney’s treatment of Sasha Exeter, namely how Jessica wrote a public apology to Sasha and then privately texted her threatening to sue her for libel - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: How do I think this will play out between Meghan Markle and her best friend, Jessica Mulroney? After Mulroney frightened and threatened to sue Sasha Exeter for liable, and then Exeter came forward with her fears, publicly, as is right and proper? And Jessica has lost a sponsor already in addition to her television show, and will probably lose more sponsors and Instagram followers.  I think Meghan has enough problems of her own, with lawsuits, Disney choosing to work with Beyoncé for $100 million, and the Obamas leading a Black Lives Matter symposium that included Taylor Swift and not Meghan Markle? Privately, I think Meghan needs her friends right now. She and Harry have not had any projects that have brought in some much needed money, so publicly Meghan needs to distance herself for a while from Jessica.  Jessica certainly knows a lot about Meghan Markle. They have been best friends for quite a few years and met when Meghan moved to Toronto to film her series. I hope Meghan doesn’t ghost Jessica, because friends are supposed to be there even in the bad times. So I see it looking publicly like Meghan isn’t fiends with her best friend, but in reality they will still talk and text. This is the one woman Meghan trusted to watch Archie while she traveled to the UK and also the US on business, back when Meghan, Harry and Archie all lived in Canada. Meghan left Archie with Jessica Mulroney. I can see it looking like Meghan isn’t friends with her, but eventually this will pass, and hopefully the two women will have been seen to have remained tight. But, for Meghan’s image she probably needs to distance herself from Mulroney. Jessica wrote some awful things. Her actions were terrible.  Meghan can’t drown. She needs to look to people who can help her, and right now Jessica, as much as they like one another, cannot do that for Meghan. I hope Meghan does find work. I hope she embraces her identity as a biracial woman, and she finds work as one also. Meghan finds herself trying to generate income in a new world where a pandemic still is a very real threat, the Black Lives Matter movement is gaining momentum such as it has never seen, and it’s a confusing landscape. So much has changed since Meghan left Suits. Being a biracial actress can be a very cool thing. We have a long way to go until black women have a strong voice with good roles as actresses in Hollywood. I look forward to that day. Could Meghan go to NYC and act in a play? I don’t think so, but I personally don’t think she’s a great actress. She is okay. Add dancing and singing to that and suddenly NYC is a possibility for her.  Meghan is drowning in all her money woes. She can’t carry the weight of a floundering Jessica Mulroney too. I believe they will remain friends, just not publicly right now. It has to be a quiet friendship, and when the time is right, and Jessica rises from the ashes, Meghan will be seen publicly with her again. Until then? I think Meghan will make it look like they aren’t super close anymore. It’s a tough world out there. People come back from making mistakes. But in the world of celebrities, one has to make themselves look good to the world, and now? Black Lives Matter is very important to the world. Meghan is trying to stay relevant in a constantly changing environment. And she needs to earn money soon.

This is certainly an interesting situation. The court of public opinion, and Jessica’s employers have already spoken out, condemning her of racist comments, which Jessica tried to deflect by the old “my best friend is a black woman” hew and cry. So, it does appear that Meghan has been called upon by a desperate Jessica to defend her. But will she? Personally, I don’t see how she can without being called a hypocrite.  What horrible timing, too. Right after Meghan has made public in Essence magazine her video to the Immaculate Heart graduating class with a definite “Black Lives Matter” message. So, I don’t see her defending Jessica publicly at all. The bigger question is will their private relationship survive this, or will Meghan drop that friendship like a hot potato, which it is right now. Meghan has a reputation for dropping family, but I haven’t heard about her treating friends in a similar fashion. It would be cruel, if she did. This is her friend whose children were in her wedding. Whom she entrusted Archie with when she did the farewell tour in the UK. When she and Harry went to the JP Morgan event. It seems that Jessica has always been her go-to person when she needs something. I think it’s sad that Meghan probably won’t be able to return the favor in this instance. But it wouldn’t be the first time she put her public image and career ahead of others’ needs and feelings. I don’t believe that Harry is happy with his current circumstances - no close friends or family near him to lean on. And I feel certain he is missing that, trying to adjust to a strange town in a strange country, especially with coronavirus, protests and riots consuming the attention of the public. It can’t be easy. Canada had to be far more soothing. So, sadly, I think that Meghan will distance herself from Jessica even as far as their personal relationship goes- at least for the time being. Will their friendship survive in the long run? That’s the million dollar question.
